page.title: 03Farming in Westhill (cont).
page.content:
Both of the farms use fertiliser on their land to give it better quality.Between them their{crops} consist of turnips,potatoes,corn, barley,grass and hay.
The rising times of the farmers are between 6.45 am and 7.00am.
Both of the farmers would like their children to continue the farming business,so that their children can continue what their fathers and grandfathers started.
Both farmers like living in Skene because of its friendly attitude as they have lived here all of their life.
